mapper.select: SELECT TREE_AFTER FROM(SELECT TREE_AFTER FROM TREE WHERE TREE_TYPE = 'L' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO TREE T USING DUAL ON (T.TREE_TAG='PROFILE' AND USER_NO=#{mNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TREE_BEFORE=#{bName},TREE_AFTER=#{aName} WHERE USER_NO=#{mNo} AND TREE_TAG='PROFILE' WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES(SEQ_TNO.NEXTVAL,#{mNo},#{bName},#{aName},'PROFILE',#{tType},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT TREE_AFTER FROM TREE WHERE TREE_TYPE='P' AND USER_NO=#{mNo}
